solution_line_template: When he gave {given_to_friends} seashells to his friends, Ali had {initial_seashells}-{given_to_friends}= <<{initial_seashells}-{given_to_friends}={seashells_after_friends}>>{seashells_after_friends} seashells.

When he gave another {given_to_brothers} seashells to his brothers, he had {seashells_after_friends}-{given_to_brothers} = <<{seashells_after_friends}-{given_to_brothers}={seashells_after_brothers}>>{seashells_after_brothers} seashells
He also sold half of the seashells, a total of {sold_fraction}*{seashells_after_brothers} = <<{sold_fraction}*{seashells_after_brothers}={seashells_sold}>>{seashells_sold} seashells
